scripts.format: dart format flutter_adeeinappwebview/lib flutter_adeeinappwebview/example/integration_test flutter_adeeinappwebview_platform_interface/lib flutter_adeeinappwebview_android/lib flutter_adeeinappwebview_ios/lib flutter_adeeinappwebview_macos/lib  flutter_adeeinappwebview_web/lib
scripts.build:publish: npm run format && npm run build && flutter pub publish
scripts.docs:gen: flutter pub global activate dartdoc && flutter pub global run dartdoc:dartdoc
scripts.docs:serve: flutter pub global activate dhttpd && flutter pub global run dhttpd:dhttpd --path doc/api
